dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning environment where the goal is to balance a pole on top of a cart. The task is over when the pole falls over, the cart goes out of the boundaries, or 200 time steps are reached, with each step returning a reward of 1.
dcterms:title: CartPole-v0

dcterms:description: A one-dimensional track where the goal is to drive up a hill. The agent receives a -1 reward for every time step it does not reach the top, and the episode terminates when it reaches the top and receives 0 reward.
dcterms:title: MountainCar-v0

dcterms:description: A two-dimensional environment featuring a landing pad at (x,y)=(0,0). The goal is to move from the top of the screen to the landing pad without crashing. The agent receives 100-140 points for landing, and loses rewards for moving away from the landing pad or crashing.
dcterms:title: LunarLander-v2

dcterms:description: A two-dimensional environment featuring a frictionless pendulum. The goal is to keep the pendulum standing. The precise equation for reward is a(I 2 + 0.1 a I 2dt + 0.001 a action2).
dcterms:title: Pendulum-v0
